attributes.action: undo the synyndrome of British policy in relation to Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: acknowledge that British policy towards Zimbabwe is a synyndrome of epic proportions, and to agree to set up a parliametary body to unify policy in relation to the Mugabe regime.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/mugabezim/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
